home.title: Real time dashboard and analytics
home.description: F1 Telemetry is a real-time telemetry dashboard so you can follow Formula 1 completely and from anywhere, without needing to watch the broadcast.
home.mapDesc: Real-time preview of the live map.
home.audioDesc: Listen instantly to each driver’s team radio during the race—we also use AI for translation and transcription!
home.circlesDesc: We keep adding features to boost race analysis, such as the Circle of Doom, perfect for undercut decisions.
home.version: Version 1.6.0 has a new chat feature, you can now send and view live messages!
home.announce: We are still working on migrating to a new server, this website may not work properly until then. See you in march!

footer.legal: This website is not associated, affiliated, authorized, endorsed, or officially connected in any way with Formula 1, the FIA, or any of its subsidiaries or affiliates.

schedule.title: Schedule
schedule.description: F1 Telemetry schedule page with upcoming sessions and race calendar.

liveTiming.title: Live timing
liveTiming.description: Real-time F1 telemetry dashboard with live timing, driver positions, lap times, and race analytics. Follow Formula 1 races with detailed data.

help.title: Widgets and features
help.description: Help and documentation for F1 Telemetry, the fan-made live timing dashboard for Formula 1 fans.

drivers.title: Drivers Positions
drivers.description: The driver positions leaderboard shows the current telemetrics of each driver.
drivers.knocked_out: When a driver is knocked out, it will be displayed with less opacity.
drivers.elimination: When a driver is about to be eliminated, it will be displayed with a red background.

compounds.title: Compounds
compounds.description: The tyre compounds are displayed with the age (laps) below. In this example, the compound has been used for 12 laps.

pits.title: Pit Stops
pits.description: We display the driver's pit stop compounds and the total count of stops. In this case, the driver has done 2 stops, using medium and soft compounds.
pits.pitlane_label: If the driver is in the pitlane, it will be displayed like this:

colors.title: Colors
colors.description: We follow the official Formula 1 color standard for telemetrics.
colors.yellow: for slower than personal best time

map.title: Map
map.description: The map updates in real-time showing relative positions. It features yellow sectors for incidents/Safety Car and red sectors for Red Flags.
map.footer: Also, you can enable the three-sector display in the preferences panel.

doom.title: Circle of Doom
doom.description: Shows the gap in seconds between drivers. It is useful to predict where a driver will rejoin after a pit stop. For example, if COLAPINTO pits now, he will rejoin near STROLL. The PIT mark is pink and thicker.

car_data.title: Circle of Car Data
car_data.description: Displays real-time car data in a circular format: current speed, throttle, brake, gear, and RPM.

map.title: Live map
map.description: F1 Telemetry live map of the Formula 1 race circuit.

announce.error: Las transcripciones para los audios de equipos estarán disponibles en breve.

auth.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters

errors.USER_NOT_FOUND: User not found. Check your email.
errors.INVALID_TOKEN: Invalid or expired session. Please sign in again.
errors.REGISTRATION_FAILED: Could not create account. Please try again.
errors.VALIDATION_REQUIRED: Please fill in all required fields.
errors.default: Something went wrong. Remind that username and email must be unique.

tourSteps.welcome: Hi, this is a guide to what's on this page :)
tourSteps.preferences: Click this button to open the preferences panel and configure the telemetry.
tourSteps.edit: In edit mode you can move and resize the different telemetry components. Only available on PC.
tourSteps.chat: You can access the chat by signing in.

error.title: Connection Error
error.message: We're having trouble connecting to the telemetry service. Please check your connection and try refreshing the page. If the problem persists, come back later.
